trans-unit.target: 所有者描述的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A>属性参考主题。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Subitem information typically appears in the tile view as well as the details view, but in the tile view, it must be drawn in a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem> event.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 子项信息通常出现在磁贴视图，以及详细信息视图中，但在磁贴视图中，它必须绘制的处理程序中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem>

trans-unit.source: The DrawSubItem event can occur for each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> subitem.
trans-unit.target: DrawSubItem 事件可以针对每个发生<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>子项。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: You can handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem> event to draw elements common to all subitems, such as the background, and handle the DrawSubItem event to draw elements for individual subitems, such as text values.
trans-unit.target: 你可以处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem>事件来绘制所有子项，如 background，常见的元素，并处理 DrawSubItem 事件，以便都绘制为各个子项，如文本值的元素。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem>

trans-unit.source: You can also draw all items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control using only one of the two events, although this may be less convenient.
trans-unit.target: 此外可以在中绘制所有项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制只使用一个的两个事件，尽管这可能是不太方便。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: To draw column headers in the details view, you must handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要绘制的详细信息视图中列标题，你必须处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The DrawSubItem event does not occur for any subitems for which no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> object has been added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> DrawSubItem 事件不会发生，无任何子项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>对象已添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A>集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>

trans-unit.source: Note also that the first subitem of each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> object represents the parent item itself, and is displayed in the first column.
trans-unit.target: 另请注意，每个的第一个子项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>对象表示的父项本身，并且将显示在第一列。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Resumes drawing of the list view control after drawing is suspended by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate*> method.
trans-unit.target: 挂起绘制后，继续描述的列表视图控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate*>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate*>

trans-unit.source: The preferred way to add multiple items to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> is to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection.AddRange%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> (accessed through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>).
trans-unit.target: 添加到多个项的首选的方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>是使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection.AddRange%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>(通过访问<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>)。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection.AddRange%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to add an array of items to the list in a single operation.
trans-unit.target: 这使您可以向单个操作中的列表添加项的数组。

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to add items one at a time using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> class, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate%2A> method to prevent the control from repainting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> each time an item is added.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果你想要添加项时使用一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection.Add%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>类，可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate%2A>方法，以防止重新绘制控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>每次添加一个项。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: Once you have completed the task of adding items to the control, call the EndUpdate method to enable the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> to repaint.
trans-unit.target: 完成向控件添加项的任务后，请调用 EndUpdate 方法，以启用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>来重绘。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: This way of adding items can prevent flickered drawing of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> when a large number of items are being added to the control.
trans-unit.target: 这种方法添加项可以防止闪烁的绘制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>大量的项添加到控件时。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate%2A> is called more than once, EndUpdate must be called an equivalent number of times.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate%2A>调用一次以上，EndUpdate 必须调用的等效次数。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Until the last call to EndUpdate the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> will not repaint.
trans-unit.target: 直到上次调用 EndUpdate<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>不会重新绘制。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Other than this, multiple calls to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate%2A> have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 除此之外，多次调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate%2A>不起作用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the specified item is visible within the control, scrolling the contents of the control if necessary.
trans-unit.target: 请确保指定的项在控件中，滚动控件的内容，如有必要可见。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to ensure that a specific item is visible within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此方法以确保特定的项是在内可见<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: When performing validation on the items in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, you can call the EnsureVisible method to ensure that an item that failed validation is displayed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control to allow the user to perform changes on the item.
trans-unit.target: 中的项在执行验证时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>，你可以调用 EnsureVisible 方法，以确保验证失败的项显示在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制选项可允许用户在项上执行更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: If the item that you want to ensure is visible is located above the viewable region of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control, calling the EnsureVisible method will scroll the contents of the control until it is the first item in the viewable area of the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要确保项可见位于可视区域的上方<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件，调用 EnsureVisible 方法将滚动控件的内容，直到它控件的可视区域中的第一个项。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: If the item is below the viewable region of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control, calling the EnsureVisible method will scroll the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control until the item is the last item in the viewable area of the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果该项是下方的可视区域<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件，调用 EnsureVisible 方法才会滚动的内容<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制到相应项的控件的可视区域的最后一项。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: To determine if an item is located at the top of the display area of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.TopItem%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定某个项的显示区域的顶部是否位于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.TopItem%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.TopItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item to scroll into view.
trans-unit.target: 要滚动到视图中的项的从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Finds the first <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> that begins with the specified text value.
trans-unit.target: 查找第一个<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref>开头指定的文本值。

trans-unit.source: The search is case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 搜索不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: The `text` parameter can specify a substring of the desired matching text.
trans-unit.target: `text`参数可以指定所需的匹配文本的子字符串。

trans-unit.source: In addition, this method will return the first item that starts with the specified text.
trans-unit.target: 此外，此方法将返回具有指定文本开头的第一个项。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> contains two list items—the first item's text set to "angle bracket" and the second item's text set to "bracket"—a call to FindItemWithText passing `brack` as the parameter will return the item whose text is "bracket".
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>包含两个列表项-设置为"尖括号"和第二个项的文本的第一个项的文本设置为"bracket"-调用以 FindItemWithText 传入`brack`作为参数将返回其文本为"bracket"的条目。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> method returns `null` if the list is empty or there is no matching item.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A>方法返回`null`如果列表为空或没有匹配项。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The text to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的文本。

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> that begins with the specified text value.
trans-unit.target: 第一个<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref>开头指定的文本值。

trans-unit.source: Finds the first <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>, if indicated, that begins with the specified text value.
trans-unit.target: 查找第一个<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>(如果指定） 的开头指定的文本值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: The search starts at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 该搜索从指定索引处开始。

trans-unit.source: The search is case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 搜索不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: The `text` parameter can specify a substring of the desired matching text.
trans-unit.target: `text`参数可以指定所需的匹配文本的子字符串。

trans-unit.source: In addition, this method will return the first item that starts with the specified text.
trans-unit.target: 此外，此方法将返回具有指定文本开头的第一个项。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> contains two list items—the first item's text set to "angle bracket" and the second item's text set to "bracket"—a call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> passing "brack" as the parameter will return the item whose text is "bracket".
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>包含两个列表项-设置为"尖括号"和第二个项的文本的第一个项的文本设置为"bracket"-调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A>传递"b 机架"参数将返回的项的文本是"bracket"。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> method returns `null` if the list is empty or there is no matching item.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A>方法返回`null`如果列表为空或没有匹配项。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The text to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的文本。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include subitems in the search; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要在搜索; 中包含子项否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The index of the item at which to start the search.
trans-unit.target: 从该处开始搜索的项的索引。

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> that begins with the specified text value.
trans-unit.target: 第一个<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref>开头指定的文本值。

trans-unit.source: startIndex is less 0 or more than the number items in the .
trans-unit.target: startIndex小于 0 或多个中的项的数量 。

trans-unit.source: Finds the first <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>, if indicated, that begins with the specified text value.
trans-unit.target: 查找第一个<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>(如果指定） 的开头指定的文本值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: The search starts at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 该搜索从指定索引处开始。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> method returns `null` if the list is empty or there is no matching item.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A>方法返回`null`如果列表为空或没有匹配项。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The search is case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 搜索不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: The `text` parameter can specify a substring of the desired matching text.
trans-unit.target: `text`参数可以指定所需的匹配文本的子字符串。

trans-unit.source: This method will return the first item that starts with the specified text, unless `false` is passed in for `isPrefixSearch`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将返回以指定的文本开头的第一项，除非`false`传入`isPrefixSearch`。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> contains two list items—the first item's text set to "angle bracket" and the second item's text set to "bracket"—a call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> passing "brack" as the search text will return the item whose text is "bracket".
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>包含两个列表项-设置为"尖括号"和第二个项的文本的第一个项的文本设置为"bracket"-调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A>传递"b 机架"作为搜索文本将返回项的文本是"bracket"。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: If `isPrefixSearch` is set to `false`, this call will return `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`isPrefixSearch`设置为`false`，此调用将返回`null`。

trans-unit.source: The text to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的文本。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include subitems in the search; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要在搜索; 中包含子项否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The index of the item at which to start the search.
trans-unit.target: 从该处开始搜索的项的索引。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to allow partial matches; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要允许部分匹配项;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> that begins with the specified text value.
trans-unit.target: 第一个<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref>开头指定的文本值。

trans-unit.source: startIndex is less than 0 or more than the number of items in the .
trans-unit.target: startIndex小于 0 或大于中的项的数目 。

trans-unit.source: Finds the next item from the given point, searching in the specified direction
trans-unit.target: 查找从给定的点，在指定的方向中搜索的下一步项

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A> method returns `null` if no item is found in the given direction.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A>方法返回`null`如果在给定的方向中不找到任何项。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: Identifying the nearest item can vary depending on the operating system the application is running on, and will affect the results of FindNearestItem.
trans-unit.target: 标识最近的项根据应用程序运行，它将影响 FindNearestItem 的结果的操作系统不同而异。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SearchDirectionHint"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SearchDirectionHint"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The point at which to begin searching.
trans-unit.target: 在该处开始进行搜索的点。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> that is closest to the given point, searching in the specified direction.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref>最近到给定的点，在指定的方向中搜索。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View*> is set to a value other than <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View*>设置一个值为非<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"></xref>或<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View*>

trans-unit.source: Finds the next item from the given x- and y-coordinates, searching in the specified direction.
trans-unit.target: 查找下一项从给定 x 坐标和 y 坐标，在指定的方向中搜索。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A> method returns `null` if no item is found in the given direction.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A>方法返回`null`如果在给定的方向中不找到任何项。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: Identifying the nearest item can vary depending on the operating system the application is running on, and will affect the results of FindNearestItem.
trans-unit.target: 标识最近的项根据应用程序运行，它将影响 FindNearestItem 的结果的操作系统不同而异。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SearchDirectionHint"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SearchDirectionHint"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate for the point at which to begin searching.
trans-unit.target: 在该处开始进行搜索的点 x 坐标。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate for the point at which to begin searching.
trans-unit.target: 在该处开始进行搜索的点 y 坐标。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> that is closest to the given coordinates, searching in the specified direction.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref>与给定的坐标，在指定的方向中搜索最近。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View*> is set to a value other than <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View*>设置一个值为非<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"></xref>或<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the item in the control that currently has focus.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当前具有焦点的控件中的项。

trans-unit.source: The FocusedItem property returns the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> that represents the item currently displaying the focus rectangle for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: FocusedItem 属性返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>，表示当前正在显示的聚焦框的项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: Because a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control has no directly editable areas other than the items it displays, when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control has focus, an item within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> displays the focus reticle around its item text.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件具有不与它显示的项不直接编辑区域时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件有焦点中的项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>显示焦点标线放置在其项文本两侧。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Typically, the last selected item in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control is the item with focus.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，最后选择的项在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件是具有焦点的项。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Although an item may be the one displaying the focus reticle, it may not actually be a selected item in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.
trans-unit.target: 虽然项目可能显示焦点标线，但实际上它可能不是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>中的某个选定的项

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices%2A> properties to obtain the selected items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control, the FocusedItem property is not necessarily selected.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices%2A>属性来获取中的选定的项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制，不一定选择属性 FocusedItem。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use the FocusedItem property to determine which item was last clicked in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control, regardless of selection state.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用 FocusedItem 属性以确定哪一项上次中被单击<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件，而不考虑所选内容状态。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> that represents the item that has focus, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no item has the focus in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> ，表示具有焦点的项或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果任何项不具有焦点<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the foreground color.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的前景色。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the foreground color.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> ，它是前景颜色。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether clicking an item selects all its subitems.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示单击某项选择其所有子项。

trans-unit.source: The FullRowSelect property has no effect unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.
trans-unit.target: FullRowSelect 属性无任何效果，除非<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A><xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>属性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>

trans-unit.source: The FullRowSelect property is typically used when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> displays items with many subitems and it is important to be able to see selected items when the item text is not visible due to horizontal scrolling of the control's contents.
trans-unit.target: FullRowSelect 属性通常是时使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>具有许多子项和它的显示项务必要能够项文本是不可见由于水平滚动的控件的内容时，将显示所选的项目。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When FullRowSelect is set to `true`, ToolTips for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> will not be shown; only the ToolTip for the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 时 FullRowSelect 设置为`true`的工具提示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>不会显示; 仅父级的工具提示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>显示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if clicking an item selects the item and all its subitems; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if clicking an item selects only the item itself.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果将该项目，其所有子项; 单击某项选择<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果单击某项选择项本身。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the item at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: 检索位于指定位置的项。

trans-unit.source: The GetItemAt method lets you determine which item is located at a specific location within the client region of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: GetItemAt 方法可让你确定哪一项位于中的客户端区域的特定位置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: You can use this method when the user clicks or right-clicks a subitem (when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to `View.Details`) and you want to determine which item owns the subitem that was clicked based on the mouse coordinates at the time the user clicked the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 用户单击或右击子项时，可以使用此方法 (时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>属性设置为`View.Details`) 并且你想要确定哪一项拥有的子项时，单击在用户单击鼠标时根据鼠标坐标。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FullRowSelect%2A> property value is `false`, this method returns an item only when the specified location is within the bounds of the parent item (which is displayed in the first column when the control is in details mode).
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FullRowSelect%2A>属性值是`false`，此方法返回一个项，仅当指定的位置在父项 （当控件处于详细信息模式，将显示在第一列） 的边界内时，才。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FullRowSelect%2A>

trans-unit.source: You must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FullRowSelect%2A> property to `true` to retrieve an item with this method given a location within the bounds of a subitem.
trans-unit.target: 必须设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FullRowSelect%2A>属性`true`若要使用此方法，给定位置的边界内的子项中检索项。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FullRowSelect%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.HitTest%2A> method to retrieve detailed information about the item at a particular location.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.HitTest%2A>方法来检索有关特定位置处的项的详细的信息。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.HitTest%2A>

trans-unit.source: To do drag-and-drop repositioning of items within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, you might want to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewInsertionMark.NearestIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method rather than the GetItemAt method.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行拖放项内的重定位<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>，你可能想要使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewInsertionMark.NearestIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法，而不是 GetItemAt 方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewInsertionMark.NearestIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewInsertionMark.NearestIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method finds the closest item regardless of where the mouse pointer is located.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewInsertionMark.NearestIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法找到最近的项而不考虑鼠标指针所在的位置。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewInsertionMark.NearestIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The GetItemAt method, on the other hand, returns `null` if there is no item at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: GetItemAt 方法中，另一方面，返回`null`如果在指定的位置没有项。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewInsertionMark> class is supported only on Windows XP and Windows Server 2003 when your application calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1><xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewInsertionMark>类支持仅在 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 上，当你的应用程序调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewInsertionMark>

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the location to search for an item (expressed in client coordinates).
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的项 （以工作区坐标表示） 的位置的 x 坐标。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the location to search for an item (expressed in client coordinates).
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的项 （以工作区坐标表示） 的位置 y 坐标。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> that represents the item at the specified position.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> ，表示位于指定位置的项。

trans-unit.source: If there is no item at the specified location, the method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有任何项在指定的位置，该方法返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the bounding rectangle for a specific item within the list view control.
trans-unit.target: 检索列表视图控件中的特定项的边框。

trans-unit.source: The bounding rectangle returned by this version of the GetItemRect method represents the entire item, including the icon, item text, and subitem text.
trans-unit.target: 此版本的 GetItemRect 方法返回的绑定矩形表示整个项，包括图标、 项文本和子项文本。

trans-unit.source: To specify a specific portion of the item's bounding rectangle, use the other version of the GetItemRect method.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定项的特定部分的边框，请使用 GetItemRect 方法的其他版本。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> whose bounding rectangle you want to return.
trans-unit.target: 内的项的从零开始索引<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>你想要返回其边框。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the bounding rectangle of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> ，它表示指定的绑定矩形<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the specified portion of the bounding rectangle for a specific item within the list view control.
trans-unit.target: 检索列表视图控件中的特定项的边框的指定的部分。

trans-unit.source: The bounding rectangle returned by this version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.GetItemRect%2A> method represents only the section of the item specified in the `portion` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 返回的此版本的绑定矩形<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.GetItemRect%2A>方法表示仅在指定的项的部分`portion`参数。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.GetItemRect%2A>

trans-unit.source: To return the bounding rectangle of the entire item, use the other version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.GetItemRect%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要返回整个项的边框，使用其他版本的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.GetItemRect%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.GetItemRect%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> whose bounding rectangle you want to return.
trans-unit.target: 内的项的从零开始索引<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>你想要返回其边框。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ItemBoundsPortion"></xref> values that represents a portion of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> for which to retrieve the bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ItemBoundsPortion"></xref>这些值表示的一部分<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref>为其检索的绑定矩形。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the bounding rectangle for the specified portion of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> ，它表示指定的指定部分的绑定矩形<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether grid lines appear between the rows and columns containing the items and subitems in the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值的行和包含的项和子项控件中的列之间是否显示网格线。

trans-unit.source: The GridLines property has no effect unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.
trans-unit.target: 网格线属性无任何效果，除非<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A><xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>属性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>

trans-unit.source: The GridLines property allows you to display lines to identify the rows and columns that are displayed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control when it displays items and their subitems.
trans-unit.target: 网格线属性使你可以显示线，以识别的行和列中显示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制当显示项和及其子项。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The grid lines that are displayed do not provide the ability to resize rows and columns as an application such as Microsoft Excel does.
trans-unit.target: 显示网格线不提供能够调整行和列大小为应用程序，如 Microsoft excel。

trans-unit.source: Only columns can be resized, if column headers are displayed, by moving the mouse pointer to the right side of the column to resize and then clicking and dragging until the column is the size you want.
trans-unit.target: 只有列可调整大小，如果显示列标题，通过将鼠标指针移到要调整大小的列的右侧，然后单击并拖动直到列所需的大小。

trans-unit.source: The grid lines feature is used to provide the user of the control with visible boundaries around items and subitems.
trans-unit.target: 网格线功能用于控件的用户提供项和子项周围的可视边界。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if grid lines are drawn around items and subitems; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果项和子项; 周围绘制网格线否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> objects assigned to the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取的集合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref>分配给控件的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> grouping feature lets you create visual groups of logically related <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> items.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>分组功能允许你创建的逻辑上相关 visual 组<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>项。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Each group consists of a textual header followed by a horizontal line and the items assigned to that group.
trans-unit.target: 每个组由文本标题后跟一条横线和分配给该组的项组成。

trans-unit.source: You can align the header text to the left, right, or center of the control.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将左、 右或控件的中心标头文本对齐。

trans-unit.source: Any groups assigned to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control appear whenever the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to a value other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 分配给任何组<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件时显示的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>以外的值</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> groups help your users find the items they are looking for by separating the items into useful categories.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>组可帮助你查找到它们正在寻找通过将项隔离成有用的类别的项的用户。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: You can create whatever categories you need.
trans-unit.target: 你可以创建任何所需的类别。

trans-unit.source: One typical approach is to group the items based on the way the list is sorted.
trans-unit.target: 一个典型方法是基于对列表进行排序的方式的项进行分组。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can group the items by the initial letter of the item name when the list is sorted alphabetically or by subitems such as type or date when the list is sorted by clicking a column header in the details view.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以按项目名称的首字母分组的项，按字母顺序或如类型或通过单击详细信息视图中的列标题的列表进行排序时的日期的子项列表进行排序时。

trans-unit.source: Windows Explorer uses this type of grouping.
trans-unit.target: Windows 资源管理器使用此类型的分组。

trans-unit.source: To use the grouping feature, add one or more <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup> objects to the Groups collection of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用分组功能，添加一个或多个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup>到的组集合对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup>

trans-unit.source: Set the group header text and header alignment in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup.%23ctor%2A> constructor, or set them using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup.Header%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup.HeaderAlignment%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties.
trans-unit.target: 在中设置组标题文本和标头的对齐方式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup.%23ctor%2A>构造函数，或将其设置使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup.Header%2A?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup.HeaderAlignment%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup.HeaderAlignment%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup.Header%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: To temporarily disable the grouping feature, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ShowGroups%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要暂时禁用分组功能，设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ShowGroups%2A>属性`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ShowGroups%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can assign an item to a group by specifying the group in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.%23ctor%2A> constructor, by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Group%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, or by directly adding the item to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup.Items%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection of a group.
trans-unit.target: 你可以向组分配一个项，通过指定中的组<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.%23ctor%2A>构造函数，通过设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Group%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性，或通过直接添加到项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup.Items%2A?displayProperty=fullName>组的集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup.Items%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Group%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: All items should be assigned to groups before they are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 所有项应都分配到组，才会显示它们。

trans-unit.source: Any items that are not assigned to a group will appear in the default group, which has the header label "DefaultGroup{0}".
trans-unit.target: 任何未分配给组的项将显示在具有标头标签"DefaultGroup {0}"的默认组中。

trans-unit.source: The default group is not contained in the Groups collection, and cannot be altered.
trans-unit.target: 默认组没有包含在组集合，并且不能进行更改。

trans-unit.source: It is primarily useful in debugging to ensure that all items have been properly added to groups.
trans-unit.target: 它是主要适用于调试以确保所有项已正确都添加到组。

trans-unit.source: An item can only be in one group at a time.
trans-unit.target: 项一次只能是一个组中。

trans-unit.source: You can change the group to which an item belongs by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Group%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property at run time or by adding it to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup.Items%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection of another group, which automatically removes it from the previous group.
trans-unit.target: 你可以更改通过设置项所属组<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Group%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性在运行时或通过将其添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup.Items%2A?displayProperty=fullName>另一个组，这会自动删除它从以前的组的集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup.Items%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Group%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The insertion mark feature is disabled when using groups.
trans-unit.target: 使用组时，插入标记功能被禁用。

trans-unit.source: This is because the grouping feature orders items by group membership, while the insertion mark feature is used with drag-and-drop repositioning in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control that does not already order its items.
trans-unit.target: 这是因为分组功能通过组成员身份的项排序，而插入标记功能则用于与拖放中重新定位<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>不排序其项的控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> groups are available only on Windows XP and Windows Server 2003 when your application calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>当你的应用程序调用时，组是仅在 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 上可用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: On earlier operating systems, any code relating to groups has no effect and the groups will not appear.
trans-unit.target: 在早期的操作系统上与组相关的任何代码有影响，并且组将不会出现。

trans-unit.source: As a result, any code that depends on the grouping feature might not work correctly.
trans-unit.target: 因此，取决于分组功能的任何代码可能无法正常工作。

trans-unit.source: You might want to include code that determines whether the grouping feature is available, and provide alternate functionality when it is unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 你可能想要编写代码来确定分组功能是否可用，并不可用时提供备用的功能。

trans-unit.source: For example, you might want to provide alternate sorting when running on operating systems that do not support sorting by group.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可能想要提供替代的排序不支持按组排序的操作系统上运行时。

trans-unit.source: The grouping feature is provided by the same library that provides the operating system themes feature.
trans-unit.target: 由同一个库提供操作系统主题功能提供分组功能。

trans-unit.source: To check for the availability of this library, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FeatureSupport.IsPresent%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName> method overload and pass in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.Themes?displayProperty=fullName> value.
trans-unit.target: 若要检查此库的可用性，请调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FeatureSupport.IsPresent%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>方法重载并传入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.Themes?displayProperty=fullName>值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.Themes?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.FeatureSupport.IsPresent%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection"></xref> that contains all the groups in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection"> </xref>包含中的所有组<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the column header style.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置列标题样式。

trans-unit.source: The HeaderStyle property allows you to specify the type of column headers to display when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control has <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> objects specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection>.
trans-unit.target: HeaderStyle 属性允许你指定的列标题时要显示的类型<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件设置以及<xref:System.Windows.Forms.View><xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader><xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection>中指定对象</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView></xref:System.Windows.Forms.View></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>的属性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> objects define the columns that are displayed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>对象定义中显示的列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>

trans-unit.source: Each column is used to display subitem information for each item in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.
trans-unit.target: 每一列用于显示每个项的子项信息在的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The HeaderStyle property allows you to specify whether the column headers are visible or, if they are visible, whether they will function as clickable buttons.
trans-unit.target: HeaderStyle 属性，可指定是否列标题是否可见或它们是否可见，是否将用作可单击的按钮。

trans-unit.source: If the HeaderStyle property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderStyle?displayProperty=fullName>, the column headers are not displayed, although the items and subitems of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control are still arranged in columns.
trans-unit.target: 如果 HeaderStyle 属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderStyle?displayProperty=fullName>，不显示列标题，尽管项及其子项的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件仍列中排列。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderStyle?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the HeaderStyle property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderStyle?displayProperty=fullName>, the column headers act like buttons that users can click to carry out an action, such as sorting the items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control using the items in the clicked column as a key.
trans-unit.target: 如果 HeaderStyle 属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderStyle?displayProperty=fullName>，列标题的作用像用户可以单击来执行操作，如排序中的项的按钮<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制在所单击的列作为键使用的项。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderStyle?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can implement this behavior in a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 你可以在处理程序中实现此行为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnClick>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnClick>

trans-unit.source: If the HeaderStyle property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderStyle?displayProperty=fullName>, the column headers appear, but cannot be clicked.
trans-unit.target: 如果 HeaderStyle 属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderStyle?displayProperty=fullName>，列标题显示，但不能单击。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderStyle?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderStyle"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderStyle"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value specified is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值不是之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderStyle"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the selected item in the control remains highlighted when the control loses focus.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示控件没有焦点时控件中的选定的项是否保持突出显示。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `false`, selected items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control remain highlighted in a different color than the current selection color specified by the operating system when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control loses focus.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为`false`中, 选择的项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件仍会突出显示颜色由操作系统指定的当前选择颜色不同的颜色时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件失去焦点。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to keep items that are selected by the user visible when the user clicks a different control on the form or moves to a different window.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可用于保留时在用户单击窗体上一个不同的控件，或将移动到不同的窗口由可见用户选定的项。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you are concerned with the accessibility of your applications, it is recommended that you set the HideSelection property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果你担心你的应用程序的可访问性，建议你将 HideSelection 属性设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the selected item does not appear highlighted when the control loses focus; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the selected item still appears highlighted when the control loses focus.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>当控件失去焦点，则时，如果未显示所选的项将突出显示<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果所选的项目仍出现突出显示，当控件失去焦点。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Provides item information, given a point.
trans-unit.target: 提供项信息，在给定一个点。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to determine whether a point is in an item or subitem and where in the item the point is located, such as on the label or image area.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法来确定是否在点被某个项或子项和项中点所在的位置，如于标签或图像的区域。

trans-unit.source: If the coordinates are located outside the control, the returned <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo> object has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo.Location%2A> property of "None"; and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo.Item%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo.SubItem%2A> properties are set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果坐标位于外部的控件，返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo>对象具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo.Location%2A>为"None"; 的属性和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo.Item%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo.SubItem%2A>属性设置为`null`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo.SubItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo.Item%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo.Location%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> at which to retrieve the item information.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref>在该处检索项信息。

trans-unit.source: The coordinates are relative to the upper-left corner of the control.
trans-unit.target: 坐标为相对于控件的左上角。

trans-unit.source: The item information, given a point.
trans-unit.target: 项信息，在给定一个点。

trans-unit.source: The point contains coordinates that are less than 0.
trans-unit.target: 点包含小于 0 的坐标。

trans-unit.source: Provides item information, given x- and y-coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 在给定 x 和 y 坐标的情况下提供项信息。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to determine whether a point is in an item or subitem, and where in the item the point is located, such as on the label or image area.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法来确定点是否属于某个项或子项，以及在项中点所在的位置，如于标签或图像的区域。

trans-unit.source: If the coordinates are located outside the control, the returned <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo> object has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo.Location%2A> property of "None"; and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo.Item%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo.SubItem%2A> properties are set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果坐标位于外部的控件，返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo>对象具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo.Location%2A>为"None"; 的属性和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo.Item%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo.SubItem%2A>属性设置为`null`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo.SubItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo.Item%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo.Location%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo>

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate at which to retrieve the item information.
trans-unit.target: 在该处检索项信息的 x 坐标。

trans-unit.source: The coordinate is relative to the upper-left corner of the control.
trans-unit.target: 相对于控件的左上角的坐标。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate at which to retrieve the item information.
trans-unit.target: 在该处检索项信息的 y 坐标。

trans-unit.source: The coordinate is relative to the upper-left corner of the control.
trans-unit.target: 相对于控件的左上角的坐标。

trans-unit.source: The item information, given x- and y- coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 项信息，给定 x 和 y 坐标。

trans-unit.source: The x- or y-coordinate is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: X 或 y 坐标小于 0。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the text of an item or subitem has the appearance of a hyperlink when the mouse pointer passes over it.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当鼠标指针经过某个项或子项的文本是否具有超链接的外观。

trans-unit.source: Enabling hot tracking willcause the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Activation%2A> property to be set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation> andthe<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.HoverSelection%2A> property to be set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 启用热跟踪清除<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Activation%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.HoverSelection%2A>属性设置为`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.HoverSelection%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Activation%2A>

trans-unit.source: In addition, run-time label editing is not allowed when hot tracking is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 此外，只有已启用热跟踪时，不允许运行时间标签编辑。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the item text has the appearance of a hyperlink when the mouse passes over it; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果将项文本具有超链接的外观，当鼠标移过;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an item is automatically selected when the mouse pointer remains over the item for a few seconds.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当鼠标指针在项上停留几秒钟时，是否自动选定该项。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, the user can point to an item in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control to select the item.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为`true`，用户可以指向中的项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件以选择的项目。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Multiple items can be selected (when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.MultiSelect%2A> property is set to true) by holding down the CTRL key while pointing to each item.
trans-unit.target: 可以选择多个项目 (时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.MultiSelect%2A>属性设置为 true) 通过在指向每个项时按住 CTRL 键。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.MultiSelect%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use this feature to provide an easier method for the user of your application to select items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此功能为你的应用程序中选择项目的用户提供更简单的方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if an item is automatically selected when the mouse pointer hovers over it; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果自动选定该项当鼠标指针悬停;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object used to indicate the expected drop location when an item is dragged within a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于指示预期的放置位置中拖动项时的对象<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> insertion mark feature lets you visually indicate the expected drop location in a drag-and-drop operation when an item is dragged to a new position.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>插入标记功能使您可以直观地指示拖放操作中的预期的放置位置时某一项拖动到新位置。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: This feature works only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.AutoArrange%2A> property is set to `true` and when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control does not sort the items automatically.
trans-unit.target: 此功能时才起作用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.AutoArrange%2A>属性设置为`true`以及何时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件不会自动对项。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.AutoArrange%2A>

trans-unit.source: To prevent automatic sorting, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sorting%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止自动排序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sorting%2A>属性必须设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>属性必须设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sorting%2A>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the insertion mark feature may not be visible with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> grouping feature because the grouping feature orders the items by group membership.
trans-unit.target: 此外，插入标记功能可能不具有可见<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>分组功能，因为通过组成员身份对项进行分组功能排列。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewInsertionMark> class is typically used in a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> event to update the position of the insertion mark as an item is dragged.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewInsertionMark>类通常在处理程序中使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName>事件来更新插入标记的位置，如某一项拖动。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewInsertionMark>

trans-unit.source: It is also used in a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp?displayProperty=fullName> event to insert a dragged item at the correct location.
trans-unit.target: 处理程序中还使用它<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp?displayProperty=fullName>事件以在正确的位置插入拖动的项。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewInsertionMark> and [How to: Display an Insertion Mark in a Windows Forms ListView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewInsertionMark>和[如何︰ 在 Windows 窗体 ListView 控件中显示插入标记](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewInsertionMark>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The insertion mark feature is available only on Windows XP and Windows Server 2003 when your application calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> 插入标记功能则仅在 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 上可用的当你的应用程序调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: On earlier operating systems, any code relating to the insertion mark has no effect and the insertion mark will not appear.
trans-unit.target: 在早期的操作系统上与插入标记相关的任何代码有影响，并且插入标记将不会出现。

trans-unit.source: As a result, any code that depends on the insertion mark feature might not work correctly.
trans-unit.target: 因此，取决于插入标记功能的任何代码可能无法正常工作。

trans-unit.source: You might want to include code that determines whether this feature is available, and provide alternate functionality when it is unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 你可能想要编写代码来确定此功能是否可用，并不可用时提供备用的功能。

trans-unit.source: For example, you might want to bypass all code that implements drag-and-drop item repositioning when running on operating systems that do not support insertion marks.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可能想要绕过实现拖放项重新定位时不支持插入标记的操作系统上运行的所有代码。

trans-unit.source: > > The insertion mark feature is provided by the same library that provides the operating system themes feature.
trans-unit.target: >> 由同一个库提供操作系统主题功能提供插入标记功能。

trans-unit.source: To check for the availability of this library, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FeatureSupport.IsPresent%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName> method overload and pass in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.Themes?displayProperty=fullName> value.
trans-unit.target: 若要检查此库的可用性，请调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FeatureSupport.IsPresent%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>方法重载并传入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.Themes?displayProperty=fullName>值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.Themes?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.FeatureSupport.IsPresent%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewInsertionMark"></xref> object representing the insertion mark.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewInsertionMark"> </xref>表示插入标记的对象。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified key is a regular input key or a special key that requires preprocessing.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的键是常规输入的键还是需要预处理的特殊键。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified key is a regular input key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的键是常规输入的键;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an item is activated.
trans-unit.target: 在激活一项时发生。

trans-unit.source: The ItemActivate event occurs when the user activates one or more items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 当用户激活中的一个或多个项则 ItemActivate 事件发生<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The user can activate an item with either a single-click or double-click, depending on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Activation%2A> property, or with the keyboard.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以通过激活某项单击或双击，具体取决于值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Activation%2A>属性，或键盘。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Activation%2A>

trans-unit.source: From within the event handler for the ItemActivate event, you can reference the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices%2A> properties to access the collection of items selected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> to determine which items are being activated.
trans-unit.target: 从内的事件处理程序 ItemActivate 事件中，你可以引用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices%2A>属性访问集合中的选定项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>以确定正在激活的项。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the check state of an item changes.
trans-unit.target: 当某一项的复选状态更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A> property must be set to true in order for check boxes to be displayed next to each item in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A>属性必须设置为 true 顺序显示在每个项旁边的复选框<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ItemCheck event occurs when the check state of an item changes or when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 直到事件中出现的项的复选状态更改时或当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A>属性设置为`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can create an event handler for the ItemCheck event to perform tasks such as changing the state of an item's icon or another application-specific task each time an item is checked in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 你可以创建的事件处理程序要执行任务，如更改的状态的项的图标的直到事件或另一个特定于应用程序的任务项每次签入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the window handle has not been created when the ItemCheck event is raised, the event will be delayed.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果尚未创建的窗口句柄，当引发直到事件时，事件将被延迟。

trans-unit.source: Once the window handle is created (when the form is shown), any delayed ItemCheck events will be raised.
trans-unit.target: 窗口句柄创建后 （在显示窗体） 时，会引发任何延迟的直到事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleCreated>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleCreated>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleCreated>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the checked state of an item changes.
trans-unit.target: 当某个项的选中的状态更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event is similar to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemCheck> event, but is raised after the item has been checked.
trans-unit.target: 此事件是类似于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemCheck>事件，但选中项之后，将引发。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemCheck>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user begins dragging an item.
trans-unit.target: 当用户开始拖动项时发生。

trans-unit.source: The ItemDrag event occurs when the user begins dragging an item.
trans-unit.target: 当用户开始拖动项时发生时。

trans-unit.source: Typically the event handler for the ItemDrag event performs the task of dragging by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序时通常执行的任务通过调用拖动<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to perform the tasks necessary to drag items into and out of your application's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此事件来执行将项拖入和移出你的应用程序所必需的任务<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.target: 当鼠标悬停于某项时发生。

trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。
