trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the properties of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control that manage the appearance of the control.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的属性<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref>管理控件的外观的控件。

trans-unit.source: Forces a range of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> objects to be redrawn.
trans-unit.target: 强制一系列<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref>对象重绘。

trans-unit.source: The RedrawItems method can be used whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> is in virtual mode or regular mode.
trans-unit.target: RedrawItems 方法可以是是否使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>处于虚拟模式或常规模式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate%2A> method has been called prior to the call to RedrawItems, the redraw will not occur.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate%2A>方法已调用之前调用了 RedrawItems，将不会进行重绘。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index for the first item in the range to be redrawn.
trans-unit.target: 要重新绘制的范围内第一个项的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index for the last item of the range to be redrawn.
trans-unit.target: 用于将重新绘制的范围的最后一项的索引。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to invalidate the range of items; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to invalidate and repaint the items.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>要使之无效的项; 的范围<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>使无效并重新绘制项。

trans-unit.source: startIndex or endIndex is less than 0, greater than or equal to the number of items in the or, if in virtual mode, greater than the value of .
trans-unit.target: startIndex或endIndex小于 0，大于或等于的中的项数或者，如果在虚拟模式下，大于值。

trans-unit.source: -or- The given startIndex is greater than the endIndex.
trans-unit.target: -或-给定startIndex大于endIndex.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> is in virtual mode and requires a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref>是在虚拟模式下，需要<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> object is in virtual mode, it creates <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> objects dynamically instead of using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>对象处于虚拟模式时，它会创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>对象，而使用非动态<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A>集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised when the object must create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> object.
trans-unit.target: 必须在创建对象时，将引发此事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>对象。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: A handler for this event should create the appropriate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> or retrieve it from the cache, and pass it back by way of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RetrieveVirtualItemEventArgs.Item%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此事件的处理程序应创建相应<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>或从缓存中检索它，并将其传回传递<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RetrieveVirtualItemEventArgs.Item%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RetrieveVirtualItemEventArgs.Item%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RetrieveVirtualItemEventArgs.Item*> property is not set to an item when the RetrieveVirtualItem event is handled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RetrieveVirtualItemEventArgs.Item*>处理 RetrieveVirtualItem 事件时未对某个项设置属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RetrieveVirtualItemEventArgs.Item*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control is laid out from right to left.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示控件是否从右到左布局。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> property is for use with international applications where the language is read from right to left.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>属性以用于国际应用程序是从右到左阅读的语言。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: If you set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft> to true the control's contents and text will be laid out from right to left.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft>为 true 控件的内容和文本将布局为从右向左。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control is laid out from right to left; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要指示<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref>控件是否布局为从右向左; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RightToLeftLayout*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RightToLeftLayout*>属性更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RightToLeftLayout*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a scroll bar is added to the control when there is not enough room to display all items.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值是否滚动条添加到控件中，当没有足够空间来显示所有项。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> displays a vertical scroll bar to use when the number of items exceeds the size of the client area of the control.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>显示垂直滚动条用于项的数目超过控件的客户端区域的大小。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to ensure that the user can access all items that are available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此属性以确保用户可以访问所提供的所有项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] prior to version 2.0, the column headers were not painted correctly when setting this property to `false` and resizing the control to make it larger.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> 的版本中[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]之前 2.0 版中，列标题不正确绘制时将此属性设置为`false`和调整大小以使其更大的控件。

trans-unit.source: To work around this issue, set this property to `true` in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ResizeBegin> event handler and set it back to `false` in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ResizeEnd> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要解决此问题，请将此属性设置为`true`中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ResizeBegin>事件处理程序并将其设置回`false`中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ResizeEnd>事件处理程序。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ResizeEnd> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ResizeBegin>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if scroll bars are added to the control when necessary to allow the user to see all the items; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果添加到必要时允许用户查看所有项，则控件的滚动条否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> is in virtual mode and a search is taking place.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref>处于虚拟模式和搜索是否正在进行。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> is in virtual mode and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 此事件发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>处于虚拟模式和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A>调用方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: When handling this event, you should calculate which item from the list of items supplied by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A> property matches the search criteria and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SearchForVirtualItemEventArgs.Index%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to the index of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>.
trans-unit.target: 处理此事件时，应计算由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A>属性与搜索条件匹配，并且设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SearchForVirtualItemEventArgs.Index%2A?displayProperty=fullName>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>的索引的属性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SearchForVirtualItemEventArgs.Index%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A>提供的项的项从列表

trans-unit.source: If an item is not provided, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> will return `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供某个项，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A>将返回`null`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices*> collection changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices*>集合更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices%2A> collection changes whenever the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Selected%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> changes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices%2A>集合每当更改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Selected%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Selected%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices%2A>

trans-unit.source: The property change can occur programmatically or when the user selects an item or clears the selection of an item.
trans-unit.target: 属性更改可以以编程方式发生，或当用户选择某一项或清除选择的项。

trans-unit.source: When the user selects an item without pressing CTRL to perform a multiple selection, the control first clears the previous selection.
trans-unit.target: 当用户选择一个项，而无需按 ctrl 键，可执行多个所选内容时，控件首先会清除以前的选择。

trans-unit.source: In this case, this event occurs one time for each item that was previously selected and one time for the newly selected item.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，为每个以前选择的项的一次，一次新选定的项，将发生此事件。

trans-unit.source: To determine which items are selected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A> property to access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedListViewItemCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A>属性来访问<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedListViewItemCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedListViewItemCollection></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>中选择项

trans-unit.source: You can create an event handler for this event to perform tasks whenever there is a change to the selected items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 你可以创建的事件处理程序此事件以对中的选定项的更改时执行任务<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets the indexes of the selected items in the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取控件中选定项的索引。

trans-unit.source: The SelectedIndices property will not contain any indexes if the property is accessed before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> handle is created, which typically occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> is initially loaded for display in the form.
trans-unit.target: SelectedIndices 属性将不会包含任何索引，如果此属性访问之前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>创建句柄，这通常发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>以窗体显示为最初加载。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: You can check to see if the handle is created with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsHandleCreated%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以检查以查看是否与创建句柄<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsHandleCreated%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsHandleCreated%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.MultiSelect%2A> property is set to `true`, this property returns a collection containing the indexes of all items that are selected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.MultiSelect%2A>属性设置为`true`，此属性返回一个包含在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>中选择的所有项的索引的集合</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.MultiSelect%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a single-selection <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, this property returns a collection containing a single element containing the index of the only selected item in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.
trans-unit.target: 单项选择<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>，则此属性返回一个包含单个元素包含在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>唯一选定的项的索引的集合</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the tasks that can be performed with the items in the collection, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用集合中的项执行的任务的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection>

trans-unit.source: If you want to obtain a collection of the items that are selected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control, instead of the index positions of the items that are selected, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要获取在中选择的项的集合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件，而不是选择，使用的项的索引位置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection> that contains the indexes of the selected items.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection>包含所选的项的索引。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection>

trans-unit.source: If no items are currently selected, an empty <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前不选定任何项，一个空<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection>返回。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets the items that are selected in the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取控件中选定的项。

trans-unit.source: The SelectedItems property will not contain any items if the property is accessed before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> handle is created, which typically occurs when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> is initially loaded for display in the form.
trans-unit.target: SelectedItems 属性将不会包含任何项，如果此属性访问之前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>创建句柄，这通常发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>以窗体显示为最初加载。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: You can check to see if the handle is created with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsHandleCreated%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以检查以查看是否与创建句柄<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsHandleCreated%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsHandleCreated%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.MultiSelect%2A> property is set to `true`, this property returns a collection containing the items that are selected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.MultiSelect%2A>属性设置为`true`，此属性返回一个包含在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>中选择的项的集合</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.MultiSelect%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a single-selection <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, this property returns a collection containing the only selected item in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.
trans-unit.target: 单项选择<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>，则此属性返回一个包含在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>唯一选定的项的集合</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the tasks that can be performed with the items in the collection, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedListViewItemCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用集合中的项执行的任务的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedListViewItemCollection>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedListViewItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: If you want to obtain a collection of the index positions within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> of the items that are selected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control, instead of the items that are selected, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要获取的集合中的索引位置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>中选定的项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件，而不是选定的项，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedListViewItemCollection> that contains the items that are selected in the control.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedListViewItemCollection>其中包含在控件中选定项。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedListViewItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: If no items are currently selected, an empty <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedListViewItemCollection> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前不选定任何项，一个空<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedListViewItemCollection>返回。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedListViewItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether items are displayed in groups.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在组中显示项。

trans-unit.source: Any groups assigned to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control appear whenever the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to a value other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.
trans-unit.target: 分配给任何组<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件时显示的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>以外的值</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> grouping feature lets you create visual groups of logically related <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> items on Windows XP and Windows Server 2003.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>分组功能允许你创建的逻辑上相关 visual 组<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>在 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 上的项。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: To enable this feature, your application must call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要启用此功能，你的应用程序必须调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to display items in groups; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要显示组; 中的项否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether ToolTips are shown for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> objects contained in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否为显示工具提示<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref>中所含对象<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If the ShowItemToolTips property is set to `true`, any <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> that has a ToolTip will display it; otherwise, nothing is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果 ShowItemToolTips 属性设置为`true`、 任何<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>具有工具提示都显示它; 否则，将不会显示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> ToolTips should be shown; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref>工具提示应显示; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref> to use when displaying items as small icons in the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref>为控件中的小图标显示项时使用。

trans-unit.source: The SmallImageList property allows you to specify an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> object that contains icons to use when displaying items with small icons (when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to any value other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>).
trans-unit.target: SmallImageList 属性允许你指定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>包含图标显示带小图标的项时要使用的对象 (当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>属性设置为任何值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>)。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control can accept any graphics format that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> control supports when displaying icons.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件可以接受任何图形格式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>控件支持时显示图标。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control is not limited to .ico files.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件并不局限于.ico 文件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Once an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> is assigned to the SmallImageList property, you can set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageIndex%2A> property of each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control to the index position of the appropriate image in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>.
trans-unit.target: 一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>分配给 SmallImageList 属性中，你可以设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageIndex%2A>的每个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem><xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>中的相应图像的索引位置</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>中</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>的属性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageIndex%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>

trans-unit.source: The size of the icons for the SmallImageList is specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: SmallImageList 的图标的大小由指定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because only one index can be specified for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> objects specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LargeImageList%2A> and SmallImageList properties should have the same index positions for the images to display.
trans-unit.target: 因为只有一个索引可以为指定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>中指定的对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LargeImageList%2A>并且 SmallImageList 属性应具有相同的索引位置的显示的图像。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LargeImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageIndex%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> is set to 0, the images to use for both small and large icons should be at the same index position in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> objects specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LargeImageList%2A> and SmallImageList properties.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageIndex%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>设置为 0，用于小型和大型图标的图像，应保持在相同的索引位置中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>中指定的对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LargeImageList%2A>和 SmallImageList 属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LargeImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When the images are specified with keys, you still need to place small and large versions of the image at the same index location in their respective image lists.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 时图像指定了密钥，您仍需要将映像的小型和大型版本放在其各自的图像列表相同的索引位置处。

trans-unit.source: When switching between views, the index location of the image in one list is used to locate the image in the other list, regardless of the key value specified.
trans-unit.target: 当视图之间切换，一个列表中的映像的索引位置用于在其他列表中，而不考虑指定的密钥值找到该图像。

trans-unit.source: To set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> to use when displaying items with large icons (when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>), use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LargeImageList%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>显示大图标的项目时要使用 (当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>)，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LargeImageList%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LargeImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>

trans-unit.source: If you want to use images to display item state, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.StateImageList%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要使用映像来显示项状态，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.StateImageList%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.StateImageList%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref> that contains the icons to use when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View*> property is set to <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"> </xref>包含时要使用的图标<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View*>属性设置为<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Sorts the items of the list view.
trans-unit.target: 对该列表视图的项进行排序。

trans-unit.source: Typically items are sorted using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sorting%2A> property, which sorts items based on the item text.
trans-unit.target: 通常项进行排序使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sorting%2A>属性，用于对基于项文本的项排序。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sorting%2A>

trans-unit.source: To customize the sort order, you must write a class that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> interface and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemSorter%2A> property to an object of that class.
trans-unit.target: 若要自定义排序顺序，你必须编写实现<xref:System.Collections.IComparer>接口并设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemSorter%2A>该类的对象的属性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemSorter%2A></xref:System.Collections.IComparer>的类

trans-unit.source: This is useful, for example, when you want to sort items by subitem text.
trans-unit.target: 这很有用，例如，如果你想要通过子项文本的项进行排序。

trans-unit.source: For more information on performing manual sorting of items, see the example for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemSorter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 有关执行手动排序的项的详细信息，请参阅示例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemSorter%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemSorter%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sorting%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to a value other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder?displayProperty=fullName> or if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemSorter%2A> property is set, the list is sorted automatically when items are added.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sorting%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性设置为值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder?displayProperty=fullName>或如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemSorter%2A>属性设置，则添加项时自动排序列表。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemSorter%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sorting%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Items are not sorted automatically when the label text changes.
trans-unit.target: 标签文本更改时，项不会自动排序。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the sort order for items in the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件中的项的排序顺序。

trans-unit.source: The Sorting property allows you to specify whether or not items are sorted in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 排序属性允许你指定是否在中的排序项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: By default, no sorting is performed.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，执行任何排序。

trans-unit.source: When the Sorting property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder>, the items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> are sorted automatically in ascending alphabetical order (when the property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder>) or descending alphabetical order (when the property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder>).
trans-unit.target: 当排序属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder>中的项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>自动按升序按字母顺序排序 (当属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder>) 或降序按字母顺序排列 (当属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder>)。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder>

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to automatically sort items that are displayed in your <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control to make it easier for users to find items when a large number of items are available.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此属性中显示的项自动进行排序你<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件使用户更轻松地查找项，有大量的项时。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: If you want to perform your own item sorting instead of using the Sorting property, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemSorter%2A> property in combination with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sort%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要执行排序而不使用排序属性，请使用你自己项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemSorter%2A>属性结合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sort%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sort%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemSorter%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the Sorting property is set to a value other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder?displayProperty=fullName> or if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemSorter%2A> property is set, the list is sorted automatically when items is added.
trans-unit.target: 如果排序属性设置为值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder?displayProperty=fullName>或如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemSorter%2A>属性设置，则自动排序列表添加项时。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemSorter%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Items are not sorted automatically when the label text changes.
trans-unit.target: 标签文本更改时，项不会自动排序。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value specified is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值不是之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref> associated with application-defined states in the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref>与控件中的应用程序定义的状态关联。

trans-unit.source: The StateImageList property allows you to specify an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> that contains images to use to represent an application-specific state of an item in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: StateImageList 属性允许你指定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>，其中包含要使用来表示特定于应用程序状态中的项的图像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>

trans-unit.source: State images are displayed to the left of an icon for the item.
trans-unit.target: 状态图像显示项的图标左侧。

trans-unit.source: You can use state images, such as checked and unchecked check boxes, to indicate application-defined item states.
trans-unit.target: 状态图像，如 checked 和 unchecked 复选框，可用于指示应用程序定义的项状态。

trans-unit.source: State images are visible in all views of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 状态图像是可见的所有视图中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: If an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> is specified in the StateImageList property and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A> property is set to `true`, the images at index positions 0 and 1 in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> are displayed instead of the check box.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>StateImageList 属性中指定和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A>属性设置为`true`，0 和 1 中的索引位置处的映像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>而不是复选框显示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>

trans-unit.source: The image at index position 0 is displayed instead of the unchecked check box, and the image at index position 1 is displayed instead of the checked check box.
trans-unit.target: 索引位置 0 处的映像显示而不是未选中的复选框，和中的索引位置 1 的映像显示而不是已选中的复选框。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref> that contains a set of state images that can be used to indicate an application-defined state of an item.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"> </xref>包含一组可以用于指示某一项应用程序定义的状态的状态图像。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: The text to display in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 要在中显示的文本<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Text*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Text*>属性更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Text*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of the tiles shown in tile view.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置平铺视图中显示的图块的大小。

trans-unit.source: This property controls the size of tiles when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 大小的磁贴时此属性控制的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property is useful to prevent line-wrapping when subitem text is too long to be displayed on a single line.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性可用于防止自动换行子项文本太长时间才能显示在单独的行时。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that contains the new tile size.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> ，包含新的磁贴大小。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the first visible item in the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件中的第一个可见项。

trans-unit.source: Initially, the item with the index position of zero (0) is at the top of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 最初，用零 (0) 的索引位置的项位于顶部<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control contents are scrolled, a different item can be at the top of the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>滚动控件内容、 不同的项可以在控件的顶部。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to indicate or determine which item is visible at the top of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可用于指示或确定哪一项是可见的顶部<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The value of the TopItem property will not always persist, depending on where the desired top item is in the list view.
trans-unit.target: TopItem 属性的值不会始终持久，根据所需的顶级项在列表视图中的位置。

trans-unit.source: The number of items visible in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control at any time depends on the height of the list view and the size of the items it contains.
trans-unit.target: 在中可见的项的数目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件在任何时间取决于该列表视图的高度和其包含的项的大小。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: If the items exceed the height of the list view, the items will continue onto multiple pages, which the user can scroll through.
trans-unit.target: 如果项超过列表视图的高度，项将继续到多个页，用户可以滚动浏览。

trans-unit.source: If you set the TopItem property to an item in the last page of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, the item will automatically be scrolled into view; however, TopItem will be set to the actual top item of the last page.
trans-unit.target: 如果你将 TopItem 属性设置为的最后一页中的项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>，项将自动滚动到视图; 但是，TopItem 将设置为实际顶部的项的最后一页。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: To ensure that a specific item is in the visible region of the control (but not necessarily in the top position), use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EnsureVisible%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保特定的项在控件的可见区域 （但不是一定在最顶部的位置），使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EnsureVisible%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EnsureVisible%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting this property has no effect when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Scrollable%2A> property value is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 设置此属性未包含任何时生效<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Scrollable%2A>属性值是`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Scrollable%2A>

trans-unit.source: > > Setting this property is not supported in versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] prior to version 2.0.
trans-unit.target: >> 设置此属性的版本中不支持[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]早于 2.0 版。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> that represents the first visible item in the control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> ，表示控件中的第一个可见项。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View*> property is set to <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View*> property is set to <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"></xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a string representation of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 返回的字符串表示形式<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: A string that states the control type, the count of items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control, and the type of the first item in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref>, if the count is not 0.
trans-unit.target: 描述控件的字符串类型中的项计数<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref>控制和中的第一个项的类型<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref>、 在计数不为 0。

trans-unit.source: Updates the extended styles applied to the list view control.
trans-unit.target: 更新应用于列表视图控件的扩展的样式。

trans-unit.source: You can use the UpdateExtendedStyles method in your derived class to override the extended styles used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以用于 UpdateExtendedStyles 方法在派生类中重写使用的扩展的样式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: If you call this method, you should ensure that the extended styles set by properties on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control are utilized in your derived version of the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用此方法，则应确保上设置属性的扩展的样式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件将在你的控件的派生版本中使用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The following are the properties that apply an extended style to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 以下是扩展将样式应用于属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Activation%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.AllowColumnReorder%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FullRowSelect%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.GridLines%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.HoverSelection%2A>
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Activation%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.AllowColumnReorder%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FullRowSelect%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.GridLines%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.HoverSelection%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.HoverSelection%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.GridLines%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FullRowSelect%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.AllowColumnReorder%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Activation%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> uses state image behavior that is compatible with the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 1.1 or the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 2.0.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref>使用状态与兼容的映像行为[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]1.1 或[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]2.0。

trans-unit.source: Changes to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 2.0 enable custom state images to be set to indicate whether an item is checked or unchecked or in an indeterminate state.
trans-unit.target: 更改为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>中控制[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]2.0 启用自定义状态图像以设置，以指示项是否选中或取消选中或处于不确定状态。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: With the addition of this feature, the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 2.0 has different behavior than the .NET Framework 1.1.
trans-unit.target: 此功能，不带[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]2.0 具有不同的行为与.NET Framework 1.1。

trans-unit.source: If you have created applications that depend on the behavior in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 1.1, be sure that the UseCompatibleStateImageBehavior property is set to `true`, which is the default value.
trans-unit.target: 如果你已创建的应用程序依赖于中的行为[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]1.1，请确保 UseCompatibleStateImageBehavior 属性设置为`true`，这是默认值。

trans-unit.source: In order to fully take advantage of custom state images, set UseCompatibleStateImageBehavior to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 为了充分利用自定义状态图像，请将设置 UseCompatibleStateImageBehavior `false`。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you are using the [!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] designer, the UseCompatibleStateImageBehavior property will be set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果你使用[!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]设计器中，UseCompatibleStateImageBehavior 属性将设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the state image behavior is compatible with the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 1.1; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the behavior is compatible with the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 2.0.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果状态图像行为与兼容[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]1.1;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>行为是否符合[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]2.0。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets how items are displayed in the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置项在控件中的显示方式。

trans-unit.source: The View property allows you to specify the type of display the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control uses to display items.
trans-unit.target: 视图属性允许你指定的一种显示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件用于显示项。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: You can set the View property to display each item with large or small icons or display items in a vertical list.
trans-unit.target: 你可以设置要显示大或小图标与每个项或显示垂直列表中的项的视图属性。

trans-unit.source: The richest option is the details view, which allows you to view not only the items but any subitems specified for each item.
trans-unit.target: 最丰富的选项为详细信息视图，该对话框可以查看不仅的项，但为每个项指定任何子项。

trans-unit.source: Each item is displayed in a grid, with each item listed vertically and the subitems for each item displayed in a column, with column headers.
trans-unit.target: 与垂直列出每个项的子项中包含列标题的列显示每个项的情况下，每个项显示在网格中。

trans-unit.source: The details view is a perfect way to display database information to a user.
trans-unit.target: 详细信息视图是向用户显示数据库信息的理想方式。

trans-unit.source: With Windows XP and Windows Server 2003, you can also display items as tiles that balance graphical and textual information by showing a large icon along with subitem information of your choosing.
trans-unit.target: 对于 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003，还可以作为平衡通过显示大图标以及你选择的子项信息的图形和文本信息的磁贴中显示项。

trans-unit.source: To enable tile view, your application must call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要启用磁贴视图，你的应用程序必须调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The small-image view displays each item with an icon and textual information to the right of the icon.
trans-unit.target: 小型图像视图右侧的图标显示的图标和文本信息与每个项。

trans-unit.source: The large-image view displays each item with an icon and textual information below the icon.
trans-unit.target: 大图像视图将显示一个图标和图标下方的文本信息与每个项。

trans-unit.source: The size of the icons for the image list is specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LargeImageList%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 通过指定的图像列表的图标大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LargeImageList%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LargeImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you are using multiple image lists, for small and large icon view, with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control, you should place small and large versions of the image at the same index location in their respective image lists.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果使用的小型和大型图标视图中，使用多个图像列表，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件，你应将放置小型和大型位于同一个映像的版本索引在其各自的图像列表的位置。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: When switching between views, the index location of the image in one list is used to locate the image in the other list, regardless of the key value specified.
trans-unit.target: 当视图之间切换，一个列表中的映像的索引位置用于在其他列表中，而不考虑指定的密钥值找到该图像。

trans-unit.source: Most of the properties in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control affect how the different views behave or are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 中的属性的大多数<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制影响如何在不同的视图的行为，或显示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Some properties that affect the views of the items are only useful when the View property is set to a specific value, while others are useful in all views.
trans-unit.target: 视图属性设置为特定值，而有些则是有用的所有视图中时，会影响的项的视图的某些属性才有用。

trans-unit.source: For example, properties such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.GridLines%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FullRowSelect%2A> are only useful when the View property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>, while the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.MultiSelect%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A> properties are useful in all views.
trans-unit.target: 例如，属性，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.GridLines%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FullRowSelect%2A>视图属性设置为时才有用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>，虽然<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.MultiSelect%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A>属性可在所有视图中。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.MultiSelect%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FullRowSelect%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.GridLines%2A>

trans-unit.target: 下表显示的一些<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>成员以及它们是有效的单元的视图</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: For example, the View property is often set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName> because the details view provides a number of viewing options not available in the other views.
trans-unit.target: 例如，视图属性通常设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>因为详细信息视图提供了多种查看在其他视图中不可用的选项。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If your <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control does not have any column headers specified and you set the View property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control will not display any items.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果你<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件没有指定任何列标题并将视图属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件将不显示任何项。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: If your <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control does not have any column headers specified and you set the View property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control will not display any subitems.
trans-unit.target: 如果你<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件没有指定任何列标题并将视图属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件将不显示任何子项。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The tile view displays each item with a large icon on the left and textual information on the right.
trans-unit.target: 磁贴视图右侧的向左和文本信息显示大图标与每个项。

trans-unit.source: The textual information consists of the item label followed by subitems.
trans-unit.target: 文本信息包含跟子项的项标签。

trans-unit.source: By default, only the first subitem is displayed, which corresponds to the item label.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，会显示仅的第一个子项，它对应于项的标签。

trans-unit.source: To display additional subitems, you must add <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 若要显示其他子项，你必须添加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>对象添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A>集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>

trans-unit.source: Each subitem in the tile corresponds to a column header.
trans-unit.target: 磁贴中的每个子项对应于列标题。

trans-unit.source: To control which subitems are displayed and the order in which they are displayed, you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property for each item and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property for each header.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制显示哪些子项和它们的显示顺序，必须设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName>每个项的属性和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性的每个标头。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can then add, remove, and rearrange headers in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A> collection to achieve the desired result.
trans-unit.target: 然后可以添加、 删除和重新排列中的标头<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A>集合以获得所需的结果。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: To control the size of the tiles in the tile view, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.TileSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制平铺视图中的图块的大小，设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.TileSize%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.TileSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is useful to prevent line-wrapping when subitem text is too long for a single line.
trans-unit.target: 这可用于子项文本太长，单个行时防止自动换行。

trans-unit.source: For an example of the tile view, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.TileSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 磁贴视图的示例，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.TileSize%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.TileSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Although columns are only displayed in the details view, subitems without column headers will not display in either the details view or the tile view.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 虽然详细信息视图中仅显示列，但没有列标题的子项将不会显示在详细信息视图或磁贴视图。

trans-unit.source: The tile view is available only on Windows XP and Windows Server 2003 when your application calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 当你的应用程序调用时，磁贴视图是仅在 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 上可用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: On earlier operating systems, any code related to the tile view has no effect, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control displays in the large icon view.
trans-unit.target: 在早期的操作系统上, 与磁贴视图相关的任何代码都不起作用，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件显示大图标视图中。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: As a result, any code that depends on the tile view might not work correctly.
trans-unit.target: 因此，取决于磁贴视图的任何代码可能无法正常工作。

trans-unit.source: You might want to include code that determines whether tile view is available, and provide alternate functionality when it is unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 你可能想要编写代码来确定磁贴视图是否可用，并不可用时提供备用的功能。

trans-unit.source: For example, when you use owner drawing to customize the appearance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> items in the tile view, you might want to use drawing code appropriate to the large icon view when running on operating systems that do not support the tile view.
trans-unit.target: 例如，当使用所有者描述的外观进行自定义<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>平铺视图中的项，你可能想要在磁贴视图不支持的操作系统上运行时使用绘图代码适用于大图标视图。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The tile view feature is provided by the same library that provides the operating system themes feature.
trans-unit.target: 平铺视图功能是由同一个库提供操作系统主题功能提供。

trans-unit.source: To check for the availability of this library, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FeatureSupport.IsPresent%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName> method overload and pass in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.Themes?displayProperty=fullName> value.
trans-unit.target: 若要检查此库的可用性，请调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FeatureSupport.IsPresent%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>方法重载并传入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.Themes?displayProperty=fullName>值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.Themes?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.FeatureSupport.IsPresent%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value specified is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值不是之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> is in virtual mode and the selection state of a range of items has changed.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref>是在虚拟模式和选择的一系列项的状态已更改。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> is not in virtual mode, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemSelectionChanged> event will occur.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>不位于虚拟模式下，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemSelectionChanged>事件发生一次。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemSelectionChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> objects contained in the list when in virtual mode.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的数<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref>处于虚拟模式时列表中包含的对象。

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting the VirtualListSize property when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualMode%2A> set to `false` will have no effect on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 VirtualListSize 属性时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualMode%2A>设置为`false`将不起作用的时间为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualMode%2A> is set to `true`, and the VirtualListSize property is greater than 0, you must handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem> event, providing a valid <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualMode%2A>设置为`true`，并且 VirtualListSize 属性是大于 0，则必须处理该<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem>事件，并提供有效的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> objects contained in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> when in virtual mode.
trans-unit.target: 数<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref>中所含对象<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref>处于虚拟模式时。

trans-unit.source: VirtualListSize is set to a value less than 0.
trans-unit.target: VirtualListSize 设置为小于 0 的值。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualMode*> is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, VirtualListSize is greater than 0, and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem"></xref> is not handled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualMode*>设置为<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>，VirtualListSize 大于 0，和<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem"></xref>未处理。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualMode*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether you have provided your own data-management operations for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示你是否为<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Setting the VirtualMode property to `true` puts the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> into virtual mode.
trans-unit.target: 将 VirtualMode 属性设置为`true`放入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>置于虚拟模式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: In Virtual mode, the normal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A> collection is unused.
trans-unit.target: 在虚拟模式下，普通<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A>集合是未使用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> objects are created dynamically as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> requires them.
trans-unit.target: 相反，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>对象作为动态创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>需要它们。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: Virtual mode can be useful under many circumstances.
trans-unit.target: 虚拟模式可以是在许多情况下有用。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> object must be populated from a very large collection already in memory, creating a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> object for each entry can be wasteful.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>必须从已在内存中，非常大集合填充对象创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>对象的每一项可以是一种浪费。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: In virtual mode, only the items required are created.
trans-unit.target: 虚拟模式下，在创建了所需项。

trans-unit.source: In other cases, the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> objects may need to be recalculated frequently, and doing this for the whole collection would produce unacceptable performance.
trans-unit.target: 在其他情况下，值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>对象可能需要通常情况下，重新计算，对整个集合也这样做会产生不可接受的性能。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: In virtual mode, only the required items are calculated.
trans-unit.target: 虚拟模式下，在计算中所需的项目。

trans-unit.source: In order to use virtual mode, you must handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem> event, which is raised every time the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> requires an item.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用的虚拟模式，你必须处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem>事件，每次引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>需要一项。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem>

trans-unit.source: This event handler should create the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> object that belongs at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 此事件处理程序应创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>所属的指定索引处的对象。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: In addition, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualListSize%2A> property must be set to the size of the virtual list.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualListSize%2A>属性必须设置为虚拟列表的大小。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualListSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SearchForVirtualItem> event enables searching in virtual mode.
trans-unit.target: 处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SearchForVirtualItem>事件使在虚拟模式中搜索。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SearchForVirtualItem>

trans-unit.source: If this event is not handled, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A> methods will return `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果不处理此事件，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A>方法将返回`null`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CacheVirtualItems> event in order to maintain a cache of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: 你可以处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CacheVirtualItems>事件以维护的缓存<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>对象。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CacheVirtualItems>

trans-unit.source: If the calculation or lookup to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> object is expensive, maintaining a cache can improve performance.
trans-unit.target: 如果计算或查找，可创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>对象是占用大量资源，维护缓存可以提高性能。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>, the value will automatically be changed to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> when VirtualMode is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>，值将自动更改为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>当 VirtualMode 设置为`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>

trans-unit.source: In virtual mode, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A> collection is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 在虚拟模式下，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A>禁用收集。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: Attempting to access it results in an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: 尝试访问它相对于<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: The same is true of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedItems%2A> collection and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 这同样适用的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedItems%2A>集合和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A>集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want to retrieve the selected or checked items, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndices%2A> collections instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要检索的所选的或已选中的项，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndices%2A>集合相反。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndices%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> uses data-management operations that you provide; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref>使用数据管理操作，提供; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: VirtualMode is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> and one of the following conditions exist: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualListSize*> is greater than 0 and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem"></xref> is not handled. -or- - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items*>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedItems*>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems*> contains items.
trans-unit.target: VirtualMode 设置为<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>和存在以下条件之一:- <> </> *1> 大于 0 和<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem"></xref>未处理。 -or- - <>*>, <>*>, or <>*> contains items.

trans-unit.source: -or- - Edits are made to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items*>.
trans-unit.target: -或者--对<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items*>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items*>进行编辑

trans-unit.target: 重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc*>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc*>
